author: Holly Ellyatt
title: European markets set to open lower as hopes for quick coronavirus recovery fade
description: European markets are expected to open lower Wednesday as optimism over an imminent recovery from the coronavirus started to fade.
content:
European markets are expected to open lower Wednesday as optimism over an imminent recovery from the coronavirus started to fade.
London's FTSE is seen 60 points lower at 5,635, Germany's DAX is seen 102 points lower at 10,245 and France's CAC is seen 57 poi… [+1626 chars]
